main.name: Troy Clarke
main.bio: Experienced Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Strong operations professional skilled in SQL Server Development, Web Design and Development, Business Process, Requirements Analysis, Enterprise Software, and Software Implementation.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to drop me a line.

resume.skillmessage: Proficiency levels of the following skillsets:

work.title: Lead Developer
work.description: SQL and Web development, Data integrations.
highlights: Built data integrations in Dynamics GP to correct inventory costs and order pricing to accurately report earnings using SQL (queries, stored procedures, views, triggers and functions), SmartConnect and VB.NET. • Developed data migrations/integrations to consolidate sales data for four newly acquired companies, from QuickBooks to Dynamics CRM using Scribe, SSIS and SQL. • Created a mobile app for appointment bookings to grow revenue using Xamarin (XAML), C# and SQLite. • Provided technical support, development and training for data integrations that tracked customer and sales order information, using Scribe, SQL and Dynamics GP.

work.title: Sr. Programming Consultant
work.description: Microsoft Certified Business Solutions Partner (Formerly Tectura)
highlights: Collaborated with clients, consultants and developers to analyze, design and develop custom business solutions to extend and streamline Microsoft Dynamics GP/CRM. • Using Visual Studio.NET (C#, VB and ASP), Dexterity, VBA and SQL, implemented functionality that saved time, increased productivity and boosted sales. • Using multiple data sources, built extensive data migrations and integrations responsible for the import and export of thousands of rows of data, amounting to millions of dollars, using integration tools such as Scribe, eConnect, SmartConnect and Integration Manager for the Dynamics GP and CRM platforms.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
